ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: No assignee icon on cycle has not showing
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior When I access to cycle menu. Icon picture is not showing as below ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/145309221/89f521d2-7342-4a35-9f68-6e38df008b59) Then I've checking on HTML it's call /user.png as a hard code (Maybe is here?) ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/145309221/ba81b912-8614-4f30-8513-4f0cb133b7b5) Form Debug it's send HTTP GET to https://[domain]/user.png But file "user.png" doesn't exist there So, I've to workaround setting my reverse proxy if having GET at path /user.png traffic will force redirect picture that I've manually uploaded. And It's working fine ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/145309221/39a71876-e716-4b2a-a6bd-feee98f7185d) Please, Find the root cause for this issue or how can I fix this issue permanently? Thank you. ### Steps to reproduce 1. Go to menu cycle and look at the Other Information 2. No assignee icon has shown 3. look at the HTTP logs 4. workaround to force redirect traffic to get static user.png icon ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Self-hosted

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [WEB-3362] fix: create sub work item operation (#2491) * fix: create sub work item operation * chore: epic sub work item modal operation updated
